channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:15 Air alert in Kharkiv oblast. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:15 Air alert in Kharkiv oblast. Stay tuned for further messages. #Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 09:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
